metadata.synopsis: Voicebark when picking up the Spear of the Night. A sacred Sharran relic and vital for Shadowheart's quest to kill Nightsong.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. goto -818; -34; -7542. Pick up the Spear of the Night

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This is no common spear... It must be the one that Shadowheart is supposed to find.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Quite a spear. Why hide it away...?
